"特定のクライアントオーダーのクリア": "特定のクライアントオーダーのクリア"
"スーパーハード受注許可証の所持"

"We have received an invitation from a mysterious old man by the name of Benefant. He has prepared a small event, to express his gratitude for all the hard work ARKS do each and every day. However, he also included a note advising all participants to bring their best equipment. Be on your guard."
